query_1.text: Who was George Washington and what role did he play in the founding of the United States?

query_2.text: What significant actions did George Washington take during the American Revolutionary War?

query_3.text: When was George Washington inaugurated as the first President of the United States?

query_4.text: Where did George Washington spend most of his early life before becoming a national leader?

query_5.text: Why is George Washington often referred to as the "Father of His Country"?

query_6.text: How did George Washington's leadership style influence the development of the presidency?
